itunes:title: MAR 11 2022 - WAR IN UKRAINE - DAY 16 UPDATE
title: MAR 11 2022 - WAR IN UKRAINE - DAY 16 UPDATE
description:
The United Nations Security Council holds an emergency meeting at the request of Russia on allegations that the U.S. is manufacturing biological weapons in Ukraine. Meanwhile, Meta’s Facebook and Instagram have made changes to their hate speech policy to allow for “temporary” calls of violence against Russians and Russian soldiers during the ongoing crisis in Ukraine. Exclusive details obtained by the Federalist cite that the Special Counsel's office is investigating the 2016 Democratic National Convention (DNC) server hack, and former First Lady Michelle Obama’s “non-partisan” voter registration organization, “When We All Vote” targets Historically Black Colleges and Universities (HBCUs), claiming voter suppression while promoting vote by mail.

Here’s your Daily dose of Human Events with @JackPosobiec 

For more on Turning Point USA's Socialism Sucks series, ‘Exposing China’s Greatest Lie’ go to https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=am8XznQzxR0  


Go to http://www.goodranchers.com/poso and use the code POSO to get $30 off your order and express shipping!
content:encoded:
The United Nations Security Council holds an emergency meeting at the request of Russia on allegations that the U.S. is manufacturing biological weapons in Ukraine. Meanwhile, Meta’s Facebook and Instagram have made changes to their hate speech policy to allow for “temporary” calls of violence against Russians and Russian soldiers during the ongoing crisis in Ukraine.
